comment: I took Prof. Feldser online for this course, and as far as assistance and clarity goes it was just about as good as it gets for a online math course. He was quick to respond to questions, reviewed all online tests for computer grading errors and always sent out reminder emails on any upcoming due dates. I HATE math, but he made it tolerable.
I'm not very good at math by no means and received an A in this class. Take this professor. He is awesome!
Great teacher, easy instructions, open availability. I highly recommend.
Great professor.

Took this class online. Nice professor and fairly easy class. Weekly homework and 3 test plus the final.Uses MyMathLab for everything except final which is on campus. Replaces lowest test grade with Final grade. One extra credit opportunity. Hate math and didn't put forth as much effort as I should have but still came out with a C.

Prof. Feldser rocks! He worked with Pearson to get me a new MML code when my old one wouldn't work. Saved me like $100 :) Just make sure to do your MyMathLab homework and follow the practice tests when studying. He sends hmwrk reminders via email. Scary thing was that the final was 1/2 the grade for the class. 3 tests, homework, and the final.

I can't stress enough how easy Professor Feldser is. I thought an online Math class was gonna be a pain, but it wasn't! His lectures were all video taped and posted online and very easy to understand. Only 3 tests and a final. Homework was easy and you won't make less than a 100 if you do it. Definitely recommend if u want an A!

His online class is so easy. His lecture videos and handouts are posted on his site but with MyMathLab I got enough practice for the tests. Three tests and a final, which you can exempt out of. He's really good as responding fasts to emails for any questions or concers.

Prof Feldser is the BEST!! I took his online class and it was super easy! He he records all the classes so you can watch them whenever. Homework is on mathxl and you can re-do all the problems as many times as you need...i never got less than a 100 on any homework assignment. Definitely take this professor!!! HE IS GREAT!

I took his online class and it was easy! All the homework assignments were done online and you could re-do questions over and over until you got in right, resulting in an A on everything. Tests are the same thing you do in homework. If you don't understand, he will help you out.
AWSOME TEACHER. HE IS THE BEST!!!! Honestly, he will be the easiest math teacher youll ever take. He ACTUALLY responds to emails, which is something kennesaw professors do not know how to do...
He is awesome! Helpful, nice, fair, immediately responds to emails. Gives you chance to exempt the final exam. Love the online class and homework.  Highly recommend this professor!

Great Professor!  Class can be boring at time but that Calculus.  If you do all the homework, practice, and ask for help when needed you should do well.  I got an A in the class and exempted the final.  Highly recommended !!!!!

He is wonderful. I have attempted calculus several times and this time I made it but only with his help. He helps his students, offers outside assistance, answers emails and even one-on-one advice. Just do the work.

Feldser is a great teacher. If you're like me and not very good at math, you should be fine as long as you do the homework and come to class. The HW is online and tests are difficult, but there are several ways to bring up your grade. He is a great guy and wants all students to pass. Take him if you get the chance!

Prof. Feldser is terrific! He really wants to help students do well, but you have to be willing to do your part too. The material for this class is not the easiest, but he makes it as simple as he can and he gives many opportunities to get points besides just tests. He is very accessible via email and before/after class for help. Take him!

He is a nice guy and is very willing to help if you ask. be sure to ask questions if you have ANY because he can be a little confusing and go a little fast. dont forget to do the mymathlab assignments. I went out of town for a week in during the semester and he was more than happy to let me turn in work early and late.

Horrible. He gives points for alot of other things besides test..which is good because he's a bad teacher. Project pages from book onto board and works example for class EVERYDAY. Gets flustered easily when asked questions. Doesn't explain well. Always available for help though. Stay far away from this class if you want to make an A

He is amazing.  Attendance is mandatory but you get a grade for it so its worth it. Tests are 20-23 multiple choice and 3-5 problems u must show your work on. 3 easy grades right at the beginning, I mean you just print some things off. Homework is super easy also! Would reccomend him to people who are not that great at math, he will help you!

I have him right now and I have to say he is without a doubt the BEST math professor at KSU.  I don't know if all these other people caught him on a bad day or what but he is an amazing teacher.  Any questions you have he is more than happy to answer them.  He is also good about responding to emails promptly. Great for non Math majors. Very Clear!

I had him and made an A in his Elm Calculus class.  You have to be a retard in math not to do well in this class.  My mathlab is the homework and it is straight forward easy.  If you get a bad homework grade it is your own fault.  Tests are about topics covered and final is made up of previous test questions.  Take him if you get the chance
Do not take this professor if you don't already know math. I repeat DO NOT take this professor.He does not teach, Only good for students who understand math and can learn from mathlab.Test are hard

I have to agree, he does not know how to teach. I got an A and exempted the final, but it was because I'm good in Math and taught myself by doing the homework and reading the book. Uses MyMathLab as a substitute for his inability to teach.

Students have only rated him high because he is a fun guy. A teacher is supposed to teach and he does a horrible job at this. Questions irritate him and because he understands what hes doing, you should. If you can learn math from a book (or mymathlab) take this class. If you cant good luck, you will need it.

He is a good guy, and a good teacher!He forgets somethings but he always corrects himself!If you are not good at math, take him..he explains things in a way that most people can understand.tests are multiple choice too!
I really enjoyed Professor Feldser, I got a high A.  Go to class and take notes you'll be fine.  He uses MyMathLab and it makes homework easy.  Would definitely take again
Very helpful professor.  I am terrible at math but he went above and beyond to help me understand.  Loves using my math lab.  If you are willing to work hard you will do fine.

Easy class with an easy load. Attendance policy sucks, wish he hadnt had one. His tests are easy and his finals are fully based from the tests during the exam. I was done with the final in 15 minutes and aced and made a C in the class. IF i had put in some effort, this is an easy A class. Professor recommended.

Not a good teacher at all...he is horrible.  Like some others have said...he doesnt teach well at all and relies on MyMathLab to teach.  You pretty much sit in his class and listen to him ramble for an hour and a half.  This is a difficult class, especially if you have difficulty in math already. Plus he brags about his rating on here all the time.

AWESOME teacher. He was so nice and helpful. Attendance is not required, but it helps a lot to get exempt from the final (top 10% get exempt). He never once bragged about his ratings. Homework every class, but he gives you a class period in between assignment and due date to go over any questions. DEFINITELY take. Best Math teacher there is!!
he is an awesome prof. i hate math but he made all the concepts very clear and made himself very open to help his students. i strongly urge you to take his class, you will not regret it.
He's a great teacher but the class is not so great. He really helps you learn the information as long as you go to class and are willing to learn the information.
He's a great teacher.  Always takes the time to listen to question.  When you e-mail him for help on the homework he responds really quick.  I'd diffenatle take him again.

He's a pretty good teacher. He's willing to help his students understand. The test/ homework reviews are the most helpful (so ask ?'s!!) Make sure to pay attention!! He doesn't like "stupid" questions about what he just went over. There is a lot of homework.

Math is a difficult subject to teach and Prof. Feldser is just about as good as they come. Yeah, he is right from the book and yeah he uses MyMathLab constantly... but they are great tools and he is more than willing to help you as best he can.
This man is a Godsend - take him and you'll be happy you did - by far one of the BEST professors I've ever had!

He relied on MyMathLab for everything.  I learned more teaching myself out of the book than going to his class.  He moves quickly and expects you to get it the first time.  If you have a hard time with math, take another professor.
Great teacher!  No reason why you can't get a B or A. Makes sure that his students "Get It"
Very horrible teacher. Looks like he is a representative of Mymathlab. His class is very boring and unintersting. Take some other teacher if you want to be successful.

I agree with the other commenteer, Feldser has changed.  His class is ridiculously vague, he seems uninterested himself, he acts like if you know it you know it tyoe teacher, didnt really teach anything helpful except the logical teacher math instruction guide, unhelpful, unmotivating guy, wish i could say better about him as a person, but i cant!

Feldser has changed, he use to be the best but now he has gotten arrogant and he brags about him ratings he gets on here. He relies on mymathlab to much and it doens't teach you anything. Pick someone else unless he goes back to the way he use to be

He is the BEST Math professor (and one of the best overall professors)that I have ever had. He obviously loves teaching. Always willing to help. All you have to do is ask. Made calculus a joy to take. Lots of homework. Good study guides.

Very Good teacher and he really cares about students passing his class. If you need help, he will help you.  Gives extra credit questions on his tests and review sheets to help you study.  No reason why you can't get a C or better in his class.

He's a pretty good professor but sometimes he makes me feel stupid when I ask a question.  I also find him condescending and somewhat arrogant. We also go thru more chapters than other 1106 classes. He does seem like he is willing to help just you can tell when he's having a bad day.
This is the best math professor at KSU.
He's nice, and he really does care if you understand the material or not- he'll go over something until everyone in the class gets it.  He does assign a lot of HW though :-/
Excellent
Cares if you pass or not.  Make an A don't have to take final.  Very helpful and very fair.  Makes sure you understand test material.
There is only one way to go and it's the Feldser way.  One of the BEST at KSU and just a wonderful person.  TAKE HIM - you'll be a better person for it!
I DROP OUT HIS CLASS DUE TO MY WORK LOAD AND FAMILY ISSUES, BUT WHAT I LEARNED FROM HIM IS ENOUGH TO SAY HE IS SUPER

This man is a Godsend when it comes to Math.  He's easy because of the clarity of his teaching, his willingness to help, and a genuine caring of his students.  I am the WORST math student ever and I've been successful in his class.  Overall, WONDERFUL!

He is so nice and extremely helpful!  He is the nicest professor that I have ever had in my four years at KSU!  I highly recomment him.  I'm not good in math, and I still was able to understand the material and make a high B.  He is so kind & caring :)
Very good teacher who will make sure that you understand every topic covered.

This is one of the best professors I have had at KSU. He is helpful, considerate, and actually wants his students to do well. Mr. Feldser will always answer your questions and do so in a manner everyone can understand. I had him for Math 1101 -
